+// except according to those terms.
+
+// Check that dynamically sized rvalues are forbidden
+
+pub fn main() {
+    let _x: Box<str> = box *"hello world";
+    //~^ ERROR E0161
+
+    let array: &[int] = &[1, 2, 3];
+    let _x: Box<[int]> = box *array;
+    //~^ ERROR E0161
+}
